ThingDef.label: fire salts
ThingDef.description: Red salts, imbued with the power of fire. They are warm to the touch, even in the coldest of winters.\n\nCan be used as a source of fuel.

ThingDef.label: frost salts
ThingDef.description: White salts, imbued with the power of ice. Touching them sends shivers through ones body.

ThingDef.label: void salts
ThingDef.description: Light grey salts, imbued with the power of lightning. They seem to flicker with an unnatural light.

ThingDef.label: air salts
ThingDef.description: Pale salts, imbued with the power of air. They are constantly shifting in their bowl, as if wind courses through them.

ThingDef.label: water salts
ThingDef.description: Blue salts, imbued with the power of water. Staring into them produces a crystal-clear reflection.

ThingDef.label: ferrous salts
ThingDef.description: Brown salts, imbued with the power of rock. Each individual piece is almost impossible to crush.

ThingDef.label: ash salts
ThingDef.description: Grey crystaline salts, the product of several years worth of ash. Often harvested from the bodies of those who call the volcanic wastelands around Red Mountain their home.
